meanings.definition: To feature or present together with someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The movie stars were cofeaturing in the new film.
meanings.sent2: The singer will be cofeaturing with a famous band at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The two chefs cofeaturing in the cooking show kept arguing over the recipes.
meanings.sent4: The artists cofeaturing in the gallery created a masterpiece together.
meanings.sent5: The actors cofeaturing in the play delivered a stellar performance.

meanings.definition: To appear or be presented jointly with another person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The guest star will be cofeaturing in the TV series next week.
meanings.sent2: The new product will cofeature with the existing line of items.
meanings.sent3: The cat and dog cofeaturing in the commercial stole the show with their antics.
meanings.sent4: The sun and moon cofeaturing in the sky created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The siblings cofeaturing in the family photo looked adorable together.
